author: Sidney Fussell, Adrienne So
title: A Wearable for Opiod Patients Gets Retooled for Covid-19
description: It alerts staff when a patient’s condition changes, allowing people to be sent home and monitored remotely. Two hospital systems will begin testing it this week.
